Yeo Enk LouiLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 05 Apr 2019You can purchase ETFs that track bitcoin as their underlying asset. This effectively helpes you get exposure to bitcoin without having to purchase it directly.An example of an ETF that tracks bitcoin would be the XBT Provider ETN
